lead_paragraph: Second seed Angelique Kerber, one of four women's players who could emerge from Flushing Meadows as world number one, made a short and sweet start at the U.S. Open on a hot, sunny Monday.

headline.print_headline: Kerber Cruises in Opening Win in Pursuit of Top Ranking
headline.main: Kerber Cruises in Opening Win in Pursuit of Top Ranking
